name: Eagle-Eye Goggles
description: During your attack, gain Advantage for the entire Attack action.

name: Iron Helmet
description: When attacked, consider any 2x attack modifier card the enemy draws to be a +0 instead.

name: Studded Leather
description: When attacked, before drawing an attack modifier card, the attacker gains Disadvantage for the attack, and you gain Shield 1 for the attack.

name: Weathered boots
description: During your movement, add +1 Move to a single movement.

name: Winged Shoes
description: During your movement, add Jump to the entire Move action.

name: Heater Shield
description: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield 1 for the attack.

name: Throwing Hammer
description: During your ranged attack, add STUN to a single attack.

name: Poison Dagger
description: During your melee attack, add POISON to a single attack.

name: Iron Spear
description: During your single-target melee Attack ability, attack any one enemy within 2 hexes.

name: Healing Potion
description: During your turn, perform a "Heal 3, Self" action.

name: Stamina Potion
description: During your turn, return one of your discarded cards to your hand.

name: Power Potion
description: During your attack, add +1 Attack to the entire Attack action.
